name: The Rise Of The Dead
description:
Commander! Your post is under attack by the zombies!

  • Hire soldiers
  • Build an army
  • Plant land mines
  • Keep them pesky zombies out of our base!

Your army

Make your army unique: strategically deploy your soldiers to fend off the enemies.

  • Soldiers will have their own unique abilities
  • strategically deploy soldiers to fend off the enemies
  • Each zombie also has unique abilities - look out for them!

Each wave gets progressively harder, so choose wisely!

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO SURVIVE AGAINST THE ZOMBIES?

 Why you should download "Rise of the dead":

  1. 😱 It's 100% free (unless you want to support me)
  2. 🤓very fun!!!!
  3. 👨‍🦼7 unique soldiers (and more unique zombies)
  4. 👩‍💻 Juicy updates coming your way!!!
  5. 😂 up to infinite hours of game play
  6. 💀 NOT CLICHE AT ALL (this game is totally one of a kind)
  7. 😎 Original sound track + art
  8. 😀 it will make me happy

Praises

"Best seller game of the year" - john smith

"This game will knock your socks off" - [insert name here]

"Powered by Godot, made for the Game Off 2022 Jam." - nerd
